label: uncl5025
comment: Code qualifying the type of monetary amount.

values.label: VAT, 1st value
values.comment: First VAT value if, for the same rate of VAT, there are 1 to 3 different ways to set this value.

values.label: VAT, 2nd value
values.comment: Second VAT value if, for the same rate of VAT, there are 2 or 3 different ways to set this value.

values.label: VAT, 3rd value
values.comment: Third VAT value if, for the same rate of VAT, there are 3 different ways to set this value.

values.label: Additional royalties (Customs)
values.comment: Royalties relating to the imported goods that the buyer must pay, either directly or indirectly, as a condition of sale, to the extent that they are not included in the price actually paid or payable.

values.label: Adjusted amount
values.comment: The amount specified is the adjusted amount.

values.label: Amount reference currency
values.comment: The owing amount in the currency used as reference in the transaction.

values.label: Agreed charge
values.comment: Charges which parties agreed upon.

values.label: Allowance or charge amount
values.comment: Total amount of allowance or charge.

values.label: Amount due/amount payable
values.comment: Amount to be paid.

values.label: Amount in charge currency
values.comment: Indicates that the amount is based on the charged currency.

values.label: Amount paid
values.comment: Amount that has been paid.

values.label: Amount remitted
values.comment: Amount which was remitted (see remittance advice).

values.label: Amount subject to total monetary discount
values.comment: The amount is subject to a total monetary discount.

values.label: Amount target currency
values.comment: The amount in the currency in which the amount is paid or has to be paid.

values.label: Average ledger balance
values.comment: The addition of the balance all accounts divided by the number of accounts.

values.label: Bank release fee
values.comment: The fee that a bank charges for releasing monies.

values.label: Batch total
values.comment: The complete quantity of anything needed for or made in one operation or lot.

values.label: Brokerage
values.comment: Fee charged by a broker for acting on behalf of a third party.

values.label: Buying commission
values.comment: Commission paid by the importer to his/her agent for the service of representing him/her in the purchase.

values.label: Data value on carrier media (Customs)
values.comment: Value of data contained on the carrier media (e.g. magnetic tape).

values.label: Cash discount
values.comment: Cash discount given by the seller to the buyer.

values.label: Consignment cash on delivery amount
values.comment: [5017] Monetary amount to be paid at time of delivery.

values.label: Charge amount
values.comment: [5034] The amount of money charged for the provision of a service or product.

values.label: Charge summary total
values.comment: Code to indicate the total charges relating to a consignment.

values.label: Charge/allowance basis
values.comment: The amount specified is the basis for calculation of charges/allowance.

values.label: Charges collect fee
values.comment: The fee a party charges for collecting charges.

values.label: Charges in destination currency
values.comment: Collect charges payable in the currency of the country of destination.

values.label: Collect charge summary total
values.comment: A summary total of collection charges.

values.label: Collect charges in destination currency
values.comment: Collect charges payable in the currency of the country of destination.

values.label: Collect freight charge including VAT
values.comment: This is the total amount that has to be collected from the consignee or other intermediary intervening party - Including VAT-.

values.label: Collect freight charge without VAT
values.comment: For legal accounting reasons the amount without VAT has to be announced, together with the amount of VAT.

values.label: Collect other charges due agent total
values.comment: The total of other charges that are due to the agent.

values.label: Collect taxes total
values.comment: [5294] The total amount of taxes to be collected.

values.label: Collected balance required
values.comment: A certain sum of money that must be kept in an account.

values.label: Container cost
values.comment: The cost of providing a container.

values.label: Converted amount
values.comment: The amount is converted from another currency.

values.label: Credit on consignment
values.comment: Credit deducted from the total invoice amount for the value of goods not included in a consignment but included in the invoice.

values.label: Invoice total amount
values.comment: [5214] Amount, debited by the seller and being the total of related article item amounts in a commercial invoice.

values.label: Goods item for customs declared value amount
values.comment: [5032] Amount declared for customs purposes of those goods in a consignment which are subject to the same customs procedure, and have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information and duty regime.

values.label: Assigned Customs value
values.comment: Goods value assigned by Customs.

values.label: Total cash payments received by factor
values.comment: Total allocated amount of cash payments received by a factor.

values.label: Consignment for customs total amount
values.comment: [5070] Total amount for customs purposes of all goods in a consignment, whether or not they are subject to the same customs procedure, and have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information and duty regime.

values.label: Goods item for carriage declared value amount
values.comment: [5036] Value, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

values.label: Deductible after importation charges (Customs)
values.comment: Charges (e.g. construction, assembly, erection, maintenance or technical assistance) after importation, which are included in the total invoice price, that may be deducted to arrive at a Customs value.

values.label: Customs allowable deduction basis amount
values.comment: [5020] Allowable deductions from the price payable for calculating Customs value.

values.label: Delivery fee
values.comment: Fees incurred by delivery.

values.label: Deposit total
values.comment: The whole amount of money that one entrusts for safekeeping.

values.label: Development necessary for production of imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Value of engineering, development, artwork, design work and plans and sketches carried out elsewhere than in the Customs territory and necessary for the production of the imported goods.

values.label: Disbursements
values.comment: [5416] Amount of disbursements to be collected by the carrier according to the order given by the shipper.

values.label: Disbursements fee
values.comment: Fee charged for the collection of disbursements.

values.label: Discount amount
values.comment: An amount deducted in advance, usually calculated based on a percentage.

values.label: Discount amount due
values.comment: The amount of discount that is due.

values.label: Distribution service fee
values.comment: The fee charged for the provision of distribution services.

values.label: Duty amount
values.comment: The amount of duty.

values.label: Duty/tax/fee basis amount
values.comment: The amount specified is the basis for duty/tax or fee.

values.label: Equivalent amount
values.comment: This amount is equivalent to the amount to be transferred, but in another currency.

values.label: Fee amount
values.comment: The amount of a fee.

values.label: Fees paid year to date
values.comment: Payments made for goods thus far.

values.label: Final (posted) amount
values.comment: The amount posted to an account, finally, after charges/allowances.

values.label: Float (e.g. "cash float")
values.comment: The status of funds in the process of collection.

values.label: Total payments on account received by a factor
values.comment: Total unallocated amount of payments received by a factor.

values.label: FOB value
values.comment: Identifies the value of the shipment free on board, named port of shipment (see FOB Incoterm of ICC).

values.label: Freight charge
values.comment: Amount to be paid for moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another, inclusive discounts, allowances, rebates, adjustment factors and additional cost relating to freight costs (UN/ECE Recommendation no 23).

values.label: Total indirect amount payments made to a seller or his agent instead of to a factor
values.comment: Total indirect amount of payments made to a seller or his agent instead of to a factor.

values.label: Goods item total
values.comment: Net price x quantity for the line item.

values.label: Insurance amount
values.comment: (5486) Amount of insurance.

values.label: Insurance and transport charges (Customs)
values.comment: (5488)+(5290) Sum total of transport and insurance charges (CCC).

values.label: Insurance and transport charges incurred outside Customs territory
values.comment: (5488)+(5290) Insurance and transport charges incurred outside a Customs territory (or a Customs union).

values.label: Consignment to importation location insurance amount
values.comment: [5488] Amount of premium payable to the insurance company to insure the goods to the port or place of importation.

values.label: Insurance charges incurred outside of Customs territory
values.comment: (5488) Insurance charges incurred outside a Customs territory (or a Customs union).

values.label: Internal charges (Customs)
values.comment: Charges incurred within a Customs territory (or a Customs union).

values.label: Total amount of payments booked to the collateral account
values.comment: Total amount of payments booked to the collateral account.

values.label: Amount to be paid in advance
values.comment: Amount which is to be paid before goods are delivered or the service is rendered.

values.label: Registered capital
values.comment: Registered amount of equity of a company.

values.label: Investable balance
values.comment: To put left over money in something offering profitable returns.

values.label: Invoice line item amount
values.comment: [5068] Total sum charged with respect to a single line item of an invoice.

values.label: Landing charges
values.comment: The charges incurred in landing the goods into store in the country of importation, excluding Customs duties and taxes.

values.label: Total line items amount
values.comment: The sum of all the line item amounts.

values.label: Licence fees related to imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Licence fees relating to the imported goods that the buyer must pay, either directly or indirectly, as a condition of sale, to the extent that they are not included in the price actually paid or payable.

values.label: Loading and handling cost
values.comment: Cost incurred by loading and handling.

values.label: Lock box total
values.comment: The complete amount of funds that customers mailed in to a specific location. Often times funds are sent to a post-office lock box in their city.

values.label: Lumpsum
values.comment: An agreed sum of money, which is paid in full at one time. This term is often used in connection with charter parties.

values.label: Material consumed in production of imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Value of materials consumed in the production of the imported goods.

values.label: Maximum charge
values.comment: The maximum amount that can be charged for a service or product.

values.label: Message total monetary amount
values.comment: The total of all monetary amounts contained within the message.

values.label: Minimum charge
values.comment: The minimum amount that can be charged for a service or product.

values.label: National preference basis amount
values.comment: Amount giving the basis for national preference calculation.

values.label: Negative collected balance
values.comment: Having a quantity of less than zero in an account.

values.label: Negative ledger balance
values.comment: For an asset account, this would be when the account had a credit balance. For liability and owner's equity accounts, it would be when the account had a debit balance.

values.label: Net adjustment
values.comment: The end-of-the-period total amount which is left after recording appropriate adjusting entries.

values.label: Net fee position
values.comment: The payments left over after deductions or allowances have been made.

values.label: Net year to date excess (deficit)
values.comment: A negative amount of an item.

values.label: No amount of insurance
values.comment: No amount of insurance has been declared for a consignment.

values.label: No declared value for carriage
values.comment: No value has been declared for purposes of carriage.

values.label: No declared value for Customs
values.comment: No value has been declared for Customs purposes.

values.label: Quotation total amount
values.comment: [5210] Total monetary amount of a quotation.

values.label: Original amount
values.comment: Original amount, without charges, allowances or adjustment.

values.label: Other charges at destination
values.comment: (5436) Code to indicate charges levied at destination.

values.label: Other charges due agent
values.comment: Code to indicate that certain charges accrue to an agent.

values.label: Other charges due carrier
values.comment: (5322) Code to indicate that certain charges accrue to a carrier.

values.label: Other commissions
values.comment: Other commissions paid by the importer to his/her agent in relation to the goods being imported.

values.label: Other deductible charges
values.comment: Other charges deducted from the total invoice value.

values.label: Other transport charges
values.comment: (5290) Other charges paid for transport.

values.label: Other valuation charges (Customs)
values.comment: Other valuation charges which are payable by reason of the importation or sale of the goods in the Customs territory.

values.label: Packing cost
values.comment: Cost for packing concerning labour and/or material.

values.label: Transport equipment total for customs packing cost amount
values.comment: [5448] Costs incurred for all containers and coverings of whatever nature which are considered as being one for Customs purposes with the goods, and the cost of packing whether for labour or material.

values.label: Parts incorporated in imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Materials, components, parts and similar items incorporated in the imported goods.

values.label: Payment discount amount
values.comment: Discount for paying early.

values.label: Pick-up fee
values.comment: Fee incurring if item has been or will be picked up.

values.label: Positive collected balance
values.comment: Having a quantity of greater than zero in an account.

values.label: Positive ledger balance
values.comment: For an asset account, this would be when the account had a debit balance. For liability and owner's equity accounts, it would be when the account had a credit balance.

values.label: Prepaid amount
values.comment: (5302) Amount which has been prepaid in advance.

values.label: Prepaid charge summary total
values.comment: Total of all prepaid charges.

values.label: Prepaid taxes total
values.comment: [5480] Total of all prepaid taxes.

values.label: Purchase amount
values.comment: The cost of buying goods or services.

values.label: Quantity discount
values.comment: Discount given for purchase of goods in bulk.

values.label: Quota value
values.comment: The monetary value of a quota.

values.label: Received amount
values.comment: The amount is what the bank received, and the one before charges/allowances.

values.label: Sales tax
values.comment: Identifies the amount of sales tax payable.

values.label: Shipment value in domestic currency
values.comment: The cost of transportation in domestic currency.

values.label: Specific amount payable
values.comment: Amount that the consignor agrees to be invoiced or to pay. This amount is part of the total charges applied to the consignment.

values.label: Goods item for statistics declared value amount
values.comment: [5218] Value declared for statistical purposes of those goods in a consignment which have the same statistical heading.

values.label: Tax amount
values.comment: Tax imposed by government or other official authority related to the weight/volume charge or valuation charge.

values.label: Taxable amount
values.comment: Amount on which a tax has to be applied.

values.label: To collect
values.comment: Amount that has to be collected.

values.label: Tools used in production of imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Tools, dies, moulds and similar items used in the production of the imported goods.

values.label: Total amount
values.comment: The amount specified is the total amount.

values.label: Total amount subject to payment discount
values.comment: Part of the invoice amount which is subject to payment discount.

values.label: Total charge due
values.comment: Total amount of charges payable to the carrier.

values.label: Total charges/allowances
values.comment: The amount specified is the total of all charges/allowances.

values.label: Total collect charges
values.comment: [5398] Total charges to be collected.

values.label: Total collect charges at destination
values.comment: Total charges to be collected at destination.

values.label: Total declared
values.comment: The total value of declared amounts.

values.label: Total freight due
values.comment: Total amount of freight costs payable to the carrier.

values.label: Total invoice additional amount
values.comment: (5140) Amount to be added to the sum of invoice line amounts to arrive at the total invoice amount.

values.label: Damage protection plan coverage
values.comment: Indicates the amount of damage coverage provided under the Damage Protection Plan (DPP).

values.label: Total monetary discount amount
values.comment: Total of monetary discount amounts.

values.label: Total payment amount
values.comment: [5082] A complete charge for goods or services rendered.

values.label: Total service charge
values.comment: [5000] The complete payment owed to one who has performed work for another.

values.label: Cost, insurance and freight (CIF) value
values.comment: Identifies the value of cost, insurance and freight. (Refer to ICC Incoterm CIF for an expanded definition).

values.label: Trade discount
values.comment: Discount given to any purchaser at a particular commercial level e.g. at wholesale or retail level.

values.label: Transfer amount
values.comment: The amount which has been transferred from buyer to the sellers bank.

values.label: Transport charges (Customs)
values.comment: (5290) Cost incurred by shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage, see UN/ECE Recommendation No 23. Synonym: freight charges (Customs).

values.label: Transport charges incurred outside Customs territory
values.comment: (5290) Transport charges incurred outside a Customs territory (or a Customs union).

values.label: Unit price
values.comment: (5110) Reporting monetary amount is a "per unit" amount.

values.label: Acceptable quotation fluctuation amount
values.comment: The maximum increase or decrease in constituent material fluctuation which will not result in an item price renegotiation.

values.label: Total payments under guarantee
values.comment: Total amount paid under guarantee, such as under a factor's guarantee.

values.label: Valuation charge
values.comment: A charge based on the value of goods or cargo.

values.label: Value added tax amount
values.comment: [5490] Amount in national currency resulting from the application, at the appropriate rate, of value added tax (or similar tax) to the invoice amount subject to such tax.

values.label: Consignment insured value amount
values.comment: [5011] Representation in figures of the total sum covered by an insurance for a particular shipment.

values.label: Subsequent resale of imported goods (Customs)
values.comment: Value of any part of the proceeds of any subsequent resale, disposal or use of the imported goods that accrues, directly or indirectly, to the seller.

values.label: Weight charge
values.comment: A charge based on the weight of goods or cargo.

values.label: Amount to be collected
values.comment: The monetary amount that is to be collected.

values.label: Standard duty
values.comment: Standard Customs duty that would apply if special provisions did not apply.

values.label: G-Amount
values.comment: Amount out of total invoice amount being paid into a blocked account.

values.label: Insurance value
values.comment: (5010) Value for which the goods are insured.

values.label: Insurance and transport charges incurred inside Customs territory
values.comment: (5488)+(5290) Charges to be paid for moving goods, by whatever means, from the point of entry into the Customs territory (within a Customs union: to the point of entry in the final destination country).

values.label: Licence (value deducted)
values.comment: Amount in the currency of the licence to be written off from the total licence value.

values.label: Other costs
values.comment: (5346) Costs, other than packing, freight and insurance costs, specified separately.

values.label: Duty, tax or fee amount
values.comment: Amount of duty, tax or fee.

values.label: Customs duty paid
values.comment: Amount which can be deducted from the stated invoice price where that price includes the Customs duty amount.

values.label: Wage tax share
values.comment: Wage tax share of total amount to be paid directly to tax collector.

values.label: Social securities premiums share
values.comment: Social securities share of total amount to be paid directly to the social securities collector.

values.label: Adjustment amount
values.comment: Amount being the balance of the amount to be adjusted and the adjusted amount.

values.label: Guarantee amount (Customs)
values.comment: Amount of the guarantee placed with Customs.

values.label: Actual versus calculated price difference
values.comment: Difference between actual and calculated price.

values.label: Tax sub-totals
values.comment: A sub total of tax values.

values.label: Alternate currency total amount
values.comment: The total amount as expressed in an alternate currency.

values.label: Document amount
values.comment: The monetary value stated within a related document.

values.label: Total reassignments of factored invoices
values.comment: Total amount of factored invoices and credit notes reassigned to the seller or to another factor.

values.label: Stated amount
values.comment: The monetary amount that has been declared.

values.label: Minimum amount
values.comment: Lowest possible value; minimum.

values.label: Balance brought forward
values.comment: (5062) (5190) Opening balance of the account brought forward from the prior accounting period.

values.label: Message total additional amount
values.comment: An amount in addition to the total message value.

values.label: Message total duty/tax/fee amount
values.comment: Total of all duty/tax/fee amounts.

values.label: Message total amount prepaid
values.comment: Total of all prepaid amounts within the message.

values.label: Exact amount
values.comment: Specific amount.

values.label: Maximum amount
values.comment: Highest possible value; maximum.

values.label: Amount up to
values.comment: Highest possible value; up to.

values.label: Amount not exceeding
values.comment: Highest possible value; not exceeding.

values.label: Any other specification/tolerance
values.comment: Any further qualification of the amount.

values.label: No specification/tolerance
values.comment: No further qualification of the amount.

values.label: Final net acquisition cost
values.comment: The final cost of acquisition, net of all add-ons and discounts.

values.label: Labour cost
values.comment: The cost of providing labour to complete a task.

values.label: Material cost
values.comment: The cost of materials needed to complete a task.

values.label: Other cost
values.comment: Non specific costs for an item in addition to those stated explicitly.

values.label: Overhead cost
values.comment: The cost of overhead when completing a task.

values.label: Packaging cost
values.comment: The cost of packaging an item.

values.label: Prototype set up cost
values.comment: The cost of setting up a prototype.

values.label: Authorized cleaning amount
values.comment: Amount of money authorized for cleaning services.

values.label: Raw material per cart cost
values.comment: The cost of raw material expressed per cart.

values.label: Raw material per unit of measure cost
values.comment: The cost of raw material expressed per unit of measure.

values.label: Total die model cost
values.comment: The total of costs for a die model.

values.label: Total gauge cost
values.comment: The total of costs for a gauge.

values.label: Total material including purchased components cost
values.comment: The total cost of materials for an item, including components purchased externally.

values.label: Total purchased components cost
values.comment: The total cost of components purchased externally.

values.label: Total tooling cost
values.comment: The total of costs relating to tooling.

values.label: Delivery limitation amount
values.comment: The monetary limitation amount for a delivery.

values.label: Minimum amount due
values.comment: The minimum amount that must be paid on an amount now due for payment.

values.label: Penalty amount
values.comment: The penalty charge incurred if or because conditions are not met.

values.label: Interest amount
values.comment: The amount of interest charged or paid on a debit or credit balance.

values.label: Line item amount
values.comment: Goods item total minus allowances plus charges for line item. See also Code 66.

values.label: Allowance amount
values.comment: An amount deducted in advance in consideration of some specified factor.

values.label: Additional amount covered: freight costs
values.comment: Additional amount (freight costs) which is also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amount covered: inspection costs
values.comment: Additional amount (inspection costs) which is also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amount covered: insurance costs
values.comment: Additional amount (insurance costs) which is also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Additional amount covered: interest
values.comment: Additional amount (interest) which is also covered under the documentary credit.

values.label: Agent commission amount
values.comment: Amount which has to be paid to an agent.

values.label: Credit note amount
values.comment: Amount of a credit note.

values.label: Debit note amount
values.comment: Amount of a debit note.

values.label: Documentary credit amount
values.comment: [5450] Amount of the documentary credit.

values.label: Part of documentary credit amount
values.comment: Part of documentary credit amount subject to sight payment, deferred payment or acceptance when the documentary credit is available by mixed payment.

values.label: Advance payment at the beginning of works
values.comment: Amount paid to the contractor at the beginning of works in the construction to be deducted later.

values.label: Deduction of advance payment amount at the beginning of works
values.comment: Progressive deduction of advance payment, as works go on.

values.label: Advance payment amount on building material
values.comment: An amount paid in advance for the purchase of building material.

values.label: Deduction of the advance payment amount on building material
values.comment: The cost of building material less any monies paid in advance.

values.label: Advance payment amount on stock
values.comment: An amount paid in advance for the purchase of stock.

values.label: Deduction of the advance payment amount on stock
values.comment: The cost of stock less any monies paid in advance.

values.label: Amount subject to guarantee retention
values.comment: Amount participating in the assessment basis of a guarantee retention.

values.label: Amount not subject of guarantee retention
values.comment: Amount not participating in the assessment basis of a guarantee retention.

values.label: Amount subject to contractual retention
values.comment: Amount participating in the assessment basis of a contractual retention.

values.label: Works amount, initial
values.comment: Total amount of works in the initial contract.

values.label: Works amount, variations
values.comment: Total amount of contract variations, not including the amount planned on initial contract.

values.label: Works amount, total
values.comment: Total amount of works, including initial contract and variations.

values.label: Retention amount
values.comment: The amount of money that has been or is to be retained.

values.label: Deposit
values.comment: Part of the amount of retention, not covered by guarantee of retention, and thus deducted from the amount paid to the contractor until release of retention.

values.label: Deposit refund
values.comment: Refund of deposit, due to an increase of the guarantee of retention amount, or a decrease of the amount of retention.

values.label: Guarantee on retention refund
values.comment: Refund of deposit, due to partial or complete release of retention.

values.label: Amount subject to escalation
values.comment: Amount which is used as the basis for the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount subject to escalation, initial
values.comment: Amount in the initial contract which is used as the basis for the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount of variations subject to escalation
values.comment: Amount of variations which is used as the basis for the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount not subject to escalation
values.comment: Amount which is not included in the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount not subject to escalation, initial
values.comment: Amount in the initial contract which is not included in the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount of variations not subject to escalation
values.comment: Amount of variations which is not included in the calculation of the escalation.

values.label: Amount subject to price adjustment
values.comment: Amount which is used as the basis for price adjustment calculation.

values.label: Amount subject to price adjustment, initial
values.comment: Amount in the initial contract which is used as the basis for the price adjustment calculation.

values.label: Amount of variations subject to price adjustment
values.comment: Amount of variations which is used as the basis for price adjustment calculation.

values.label: Amount not subject to price adjustment
values.comment: Amount which is not included in the calculation of the price adjustment.

values.label: Amount not subject to price adjustment, initial
values.comment: Amount in the initial contract which is not included in the calculation of the price adjustment.

values.label: Amount of variations not subject to price adjustment
values.comment: Amount of variations which is not included in the calculation of the price adjustment.

values.label: Escalation amount
values.comment: Difference between initial amount and current amount.

values.label: Provisional escalation amount
values.comment: Difference between initial amount and provisional current amount.

values.label: Price adjustment amount
values.comment: Difference between initial amount and revised amount.

values.label: Provisional price adjustment amount
values.comment: Difference between initial amount and provisional revised amount.

values.label: Price revaluation amount
values.comment: Amount of escalation and price adjustment.

values.label: Provisional price revaluation amount
values.comment: Provisional amount of escalation and price adjustment.

values.label: Contractual retention amount total
values.comment: Retention on a basis contractually fixed.

values.label: Valuation amount
values.comment: Amount of valuation.

values.label: Deduction amount of direct payments to subcontractors
values.comment: Deduction of amounts directly paid to subcontractors.

values.label: Amortization total amount
values.comment: Indication of final monetary amount for amortization.

values.label: Amortization order amount
values.comment: Indication of actual share of the monetary amount for amortization.

values.label: Amortization cumulated amount
values.comment: Indication of actual cumulated monetary amount of previous and actual amortization order amount.

values.label: Current credit cover
values.comment: Limit for current credit cover.

values.label: New credit cover
values.comment: Limit for new credit cover.

values.label: Order cover
values.comment: Credit cover for an individual order or shipment.

values.label: Amount subject to dispute
values.comment: The amount that is being disputed.

values.label: Charge amount for information
values.comment: The stated charge amount is only for information. The amount will be debited due to agreement.

values.label: Total charges
values.comment: The total amount of all the charges.

values.label: Total allowances
values.comment: The total amount of all the allowances.

values.label: Alternate currency amount
values.comment: The amount as expressed in an alternate currency.

values.label: Instalment amount
values.comment: Amount paid or due for a single instalment of an instalment payment scheme.

values.label: Outstanding amount
values.comment: Amount still remaining outstanding for payment.

values.label: Gross contribution amount
values.comment: Gross amount contributed. This may include commissions or allowances.

values.label: Commission amount
values.comment: Amount of any commission.

values.label: Net contribution amount
values.comment: Amount contributed net of any commission or other allowances .

values.label: Regular contribution amount
values.comment: Specified contribution amount regularly paid.

values.label: Previous regular contribution amount
values.comment: Specified contribution amount regularly paid before a change .

values.label: Variation amount
values.comment: Difference from a nominated amount.

values.label: Notional salary
values.comment: A salary amount specified for a particular category of employees.

values.label: Nominal salary
values.comment: The salary amount without special allowances or other cash benefits.

values.label: Taxable salary
values.comment: The salary amount which is taxable.

values.label: Superannuation salary
values.comment: Salary used for superannuation benefit/contribution purposes .

values.label: Total remuneration
values.comment: The amount of the total value of a person's remuneration.

values.label: Other salary
values.comment: The amount of other salary or allowances in addition to a base salary.

values.label: Annual salary
values.comment: The total amount of wages paid during a year.

values.label: Total contributions amount
values.comment: Sum of individual contributions.

values.label: Voluntary contribution amount
values.comment: The amount is for a non-compulsory contribution.

values.label: Instalment first amount
values.comment: First of a number of due amounts if payment by instalment is agreed.

values.label: Instalment current amount
values.comment: Current amount of a number of due amounts if payment by instalment is agreed.

values.label: Instalment last amount
values.comment: Last of a number of due amounts if payment by instalment is agreed.

values.label: Current maintenance fee
values.comment: Current amount of a number of amounts due on maintenance contract.

values.label: Current leasing fee
values.comment: Current amount of a number of amounts due on lease contracts.

values.label: Day works amount
values.comment: The amount of work calculated on the basis of manpower time and supply cost.

values.label: Manufacturer's bonus
values.comment: Allowance given as a manufacturer's bonus.

values.label: Administration charge
values.comment: Charge made for an administration activity.

values.label: Fuel charge
values.comment: Charge relating to fuel supplied.

values.label: Registration plate charge
values.comment: The charge relating to the normal supply of vehicle registration plates.

values.label: Subtotal amount
values.comment: Total amount of money that is part of a complete amount.

values.label: Dumping export value
values.comment: The export value calculated for the purposes of assessing dumping duty.

values.label: Foreign inland freight
values.comment: The amount of inland freight incurred in delivering the goods to the place of export.

values.label: Concession amount
values.comment: The amount of any concession. To allow the nomination of the difference between the amount of duty plus tax paid and the amount that would have been payable without an end-use security being applied.

values.label: Chargeback
values.comment: Invoice amount charged back to seller.

values.label: Charge per credit cover
values.comment: Unit charge per credit cover established.

values.label: Charge per unused credit cover
values.comment: Unit charge per unused credit cover.

values.label: Total authorised deduction
values.comment: Total amount of authorised deductions.

values.label: Total chargebacks
values.comment: Total amount charged back to the seller.

values.label: Total offsets
values.comment: Total amount offset against other items on the seller's or buyer's account.

values.label: Total special entries
values.comment: Total amount to be treated as special booking entry by the beneficiary.

values.label: Balance carried forward
values.comment: Closing balance of the account to be carried forward to the next accounting period.

values.label: Total outstanding invoices past due
values.comment: Total amount of outstanding invoices past due.

values.label: Off balance disputed items
values.comment: Total amount of disputed invoices/credit notes.

values.label: Commission invoices
values.comment: Amount of commission invoices.

values.label: Other charges
values.comment: Miscellaneous charges.

values.label: Amount remittances
values.comment: Amount of money remitted.

values.label: Total amount of payment commission invoices
values.comment: Total amount of commission invoices paid.

values.label: Total amount of payment other charges invoices
values.comment: Total amount of invoices for miscellaneous charges paid.

values.label: Total amount credit notes
values.comment: Total amount of credit notes.

values.label: Total adjustment invoices
values.comment: Total amount of adjustments to invoices.

values.label: Total adjustment credit notes
values.comment: Total amount of adjustments to credit notes.

values.label: Total adjustment payments
values.comment: Total amount of adjustments to payments.

values.label: Base unit value
values.comment: Value per base unit.

values.label: International freight
values.comment: The amount of freight paid for moving goods between place of export and place of import.

values.label: Own risk amount
values.comment: Amount for own credit risk, not covered by credit cover.

values.label: Opening balance
values.comment: The amount of the opening balance.

values.label: Insurance premium
values.comment: Premium amount including commission without insurance tax and fees.

values.label: Insurance commission
values.comment: Amount due to an intermediary to be chargeable to an insurer for obtaining insurance business.

values.label: Insurance tax
values.comment: Insurance tax amount on insurance premium and fees.

values.label: Fee of insurer
values.comment: Amount to be paid to an insurer as a handling charge.

values.label: Fee of intermediary
values.comment: Amount to be paid to an intermediary as a handling fee.

values.label: Debit flow
values.comment: Debit flow amount applying to an account.

values.label: Closing balance payable
values.comment: Outstanding payable amount of the account at the end of the reporting period.

values.label: Opening balance payable
values.comment: Outstanding payable amount of the account at the beginning of the reporting period.

values.label: Opening balance receivable
values.comment: Outstanding receivable amount of the account at the beginning of the reporting period.

values.label: Closing balance receivable
values.comment: Outstanding receivable payable amount of the account at the end of the reporting period.

values.label: Net assets and liabilities
values.comment: Position amount of the assets and liabilities at reporting date.

values.label: Adjustment to debit flow
values.comment: Adjustment to debit flow amount.

values.label: Adjustment to credit flow
values.comment: Adjustment to a credit flow amount.

values.label: Credit flow
values.comment: Credit flow amount applying to an account.

values.label: Total prepaid other charges due carrier
values.comment: [5270] The total of prepaid other charges due to carrier.

values.label: Total collect weight charge
values.comment: [5364] The total collect charge based on weight.

values.label: Total prepaid weight charge
values.comment: [5350] The total prepaid charge based on weight.

values.label: Total collect other charges due carrier
values.comment: [5320] The total of collect other charges due to carrier.

values.label: Total prepaid other charges due agent
values.comment: [5336] The total of prepaid other charges due to agent.

values.label: Total collect valuation charge
values.comment: The total collect valuation charge.

values.label: Total prepaid valuation charge
values.comment: [5452] The total prepaid valuation charge.

values.label: Authorized cleaning charges excluded from insurance
values.comment: Indicates the amount of cleaning charges authorized which are not covered by insurance.

values.label: Escalated value
values.comment: Indicates the escalated value derived by application of an escalation factor to an original monetary value.

values.label: Original invoice gross total value
values.comment: Indicates the gross total value of an original invoice.

values.label: Original total net invoice value
values.comment: Indicates the net value of an original invoice after deduction or addition of all allowances or charges.

values.label: Offset value
values.comment: Indicates the value of an offset.

values.label: Non-taxable amount
values.comment: Monetary amount which is not subject to taxation.

values.label: Closing balance
values.comment: The closing balance is the last balance for a reporting period.

values.label: Value date balance
values.comment: This is the balance on value date.

values.label: Cost information for providing the statement
values.comment: Cost information for providing the statement.

values.label: Total credits
values.comment: The total of all credit items reported.

values.label: Total debits
values.comment: The total of all debit items reported.

values.label: Booked amount on the account
values.comment: Booked amount on the account.

values.label: Pending amount to be booked on the account
values.comment: Pending amount to be booked on the account.

values.label: Damage repair cost
values.comment: Cost incurred by repair of the damage.

values.label: Labour rate per hour
values.comment: Amount of labour rate per hour.

values.label: Total equipment labour costs for wear and tear
values.comment: The total amount of the labour costs of the repair of the equipment damage due to normal wear and tear.

values.label: Total equipment repair material costs for wear and tear
values.comment: The total of the material costs of the repair of the equipment damage due to normal wear and tear.

values.label: Add to make market value
values.comment: Addition to the base value of an item for customs duty computation purposes.

values.label: Pro-ratable value
values.comment: The value is pro-ratable.

values.label: Deduct to make market value
values.comment: Deduction from the base value of an item for customs duty computation purposes.

values.label: Interim opening balance
values.comment: The opening balance of a consecutive statement.

values.label: Interim closing balance
values.comment: The closing balance of a consecutive statement.

values.label: Balance to be confirmed for audit reasons
values.comment: Balance to be confirmed for audit reasons.

values.label: Accrued debit interest
values.comment: Accrued debit interest.

values.label: Accrued credit interest
values.comment: Accrued credit interest.

values.label: Part of booked amount
values.comment: The amount is contained within the booked amount.

values.label: Increase of documentary credit amount
values.comment: Amount of increase of the documentary credit.

values.label: Decrease of documentary credit amount
values.comment: Amount of decrease of the documentary credit.

values.label: New documentary credit amount after amendment
values.comment: New amount of the documentary credit after an amendment.

values.label: Rounding amount
values.comment: The amount by which an amount is being rounded.

values.label: Labour sales tax
values.comment: Amount of sales tax applicable to the cost of labour.

values.label: Material sales tax
values.comment: Amount of sales tax applicable to the cost of materials.

values.label: Goods and services tax
values.comment: Amount charged as tax on goods and services.

values.label: State or province sales tax
values.comment: Amount charged as state or province sales tax.

values.label: Amount to be transferred
values.comment: The exact amount payable after any adjustments.

values.label: Direct debit transfer amount
values.comment: The transfer amount of a direct debit.

values.label: Total amount of negative credit entries
values.comment: Total amount of negative credit entries.

values.label: Total amount of positive credit entries
values.comment: Total amount of positive credit entries.

values.label: Total amount of positive debit entries
values.comment: Total amount of positive debit entries.

values.label: Accounting entry amount
values.comment: Amount concerning an accounting entry.

values.label: Entry's expected amount
values.comment: Expected amount of an entry.

values.label: Closing date credit balance
values.comment: The credit balance to be carried forward at closing date.

values.label: Closing date debit balance
values.comment: The debit balance to be carried forward at closing date.

values.label: Total amount of negative debit entries
values.comment: Total amount of negative debit entries.

values.label: Budget cost
values.comment: The amount specified is the budget cost.

values.label: Actual cost
values.comment: The amount specified is the actual cost.

values.label: Estimate cost
values.comment: Amount specified is the estimate cost.

values.label: Earned value cost
values.comment: Amount specified is the earned value cost.

values.label: Warranty repair coverage
values.comment: The amount of repair covered under warranty.

values.label: Maximum amount including Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The maximum monetary amount which includes the Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Minimum amount including Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The minimum monetary amount which includes the Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Total amount including Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The total monetary amount which includes the Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Amount excluding Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The monetary amount which excludes the Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Minimum amount excluding Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The minimum monetary amount which excludes the Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Indemnity amount
values.comment: The monetary amount which is used as an indemnity.

values.label: Sub-contracted amount
values.comment: The monetary amount which will be sub-contracted.

values.label: Amount due for work completed during a specified time period
values.comment: Monetary amount due for work completed during a specified time period.

values.label: Minimum order or contract amount permitting a fixed sum advance
values.comment: The minimum monetary amount of an order or a contract which enables the payment of a fixed sum advance.

values.label: Vending machine refund amount
values.comment: An amount refunded by a vending machine as change in a purchase.

values.label: Total price subsidy value
values.comment: The total value of all price subsidies.

values.label: Advertising amount
values.comment: Amount related to advertising.

values.label: Fixed sum advance base amount
values.comment: The base amount on which a fixed sum advance is calculated.

values.label: Optional advance amount
values.comment: The monetary amount which may be advanced on a payment.

values.label: Rebate amount
values.comment: An amount returned by the supplier to the buyer (or credited to the buyers account) in consideration of some specified factor.

values.label: Penalty basis amount
values.comment: Amount used as the basis to calculate a penalty.

values.label: Total retail value
values.comment: The total retail value of all products.

values.label: Exemption amount
values.comment: (5408) To specify an exempted amount.

values.label: Budget amount
values.comment: To specify the amount of a budget.

values.label: Value of services remaining to be carried out
values.comment: To specify the monetary amount for which services remain to be carried out.

values.label: Maximum amount excluding value added tax
values.comment: The maximum amount without the addition of a value added tax.

values.label: Annual revenue
values.comment: The amount of revenue received in a year.

values.label: Co-insurance commission
values.comment: The commission paid to the lead insurer for co- insurance.

values.label: Negotiated cost
values.comment: The current cost value to which all parties have negotiated and agreed.

values.label: Estimated cost, authorized unpriced work
values.comment: The estimated cost for work for which written authorization has been received, but the work has not been priced.

values.label: Contract target profit
values.comment: The profit that will be realised if a contract target is met.

values.label: Contract target fee
values.comment: The incentive fee amount that will apply if the contract target is met.

values.label: Contract target price
values.comment: The negotiated contract cost, plus profit or incentive fees paid for meeting contract target objectives.

values.label: Final contract price, estimated
values.comment: The estimated final contract price based on the most likely estimate of cost at completion.

values.label: Contract ceiling price
values.comment: The upper price limit on a contract.

values.label: Contract ceiling price, estimated
values.comment: The estimated upper price limit on a contract.

values.label: Contract cost to completion, estimated
values.comment: The estimated cost to complete the contract.

values.label: Contract cost at contract completion, estimated
values.comment: The estimated cost of the contract when it is complete.

values.label: Contract cost at completion, best case estimate
values.comment: The best case estimated cost of the contract when it is complete.

values.label: Contract cost at completion, worst case estimate
values.comment: The worst case estimated cost of the contract when it is complete.

values.label: Contract cost at completion, most likely estimate
values.comment: The most likely estimated cost of the contract when it is complete.

values.label: Contract budget base
values.comment: The budget base cost for a contract.

values.label: Contract cost of money
values.comment: The cost of money applicable to a contract.

values.label: General and administrative costs
values.comment: Costs attributed to general and administrative activities.

values.label: Contract undistributed budget cost
values.comment: Budget cost not assigned or distributed to contract activities.

values.label: Contract management reserve
values.comment: Amount of the contract budget withheld for management purposes.

values.label: Budget performance
values.comment: The budget baseline amount against which performance is measured.

values.label: Budget cost, cumulative to date
values.comment: The cumulative to date cost of planned work.

values.label: Actual cost, cumulative to date
values.comment: Cumulative to date amount of actual costs.

values.label: Earned value cost, cumulative to date
values.comment: The cumulative to date value of costs earned as work is completed.

values.label: Cost variance
values.comment: The difference between the actual cost incurred to complete work and the budget cost of the work completed (earned value) for a given reporting period.

values.label: Cost variance, cumulative to date
values.comment: The cumulative to date difference between the actual cost incurred to complete work and the budget cost of the work completed (earned value) for a given reporting period.

values.label: Contract replanning adjustment, cost variance
values.comment: The amount of adjustment made to cost variances when it is necessary to replan the remaining work on a contract.

values.label: Contract replanning adjustment, budget
values.comment: The amount of adjustments made to a budget baseline when it is necessary to replan the remaining work on a contract.

values.label: Budget cost at completion
values.comment: The cost of the budget at the completion of a contract or project.

values.label: Contract negotiated cost, original
values.comment: The original cost value for a contract that all parties involved have negotiated and agreed to.

values.label: Contract target price, initial
values.comment: The initial negotiated contract costs, plus profit or incentive fees, paid for meeting contract target objectives.

values.label: Contract ceiling price, initial
values.comment: The initial upper price limit on a contract.

values.label: Contract target price, adjusted
values.comment: The adjusted negotiated contract cost plus target or incentive fees paid for meeting contract target objectives.

values.label: Contract ceiling price, adjusted
values.comment: The adjusted upper price limit on a contract.

values.label: Open commitment amount
values.comment: Estimated obligations to vendors.

values.label: Accrued expenditure
values.comment: Recorded or incurred expenditures.

values.label: Contract funds authorized, to date
values.comment: Cost value of contract funds authorized from the beginning of the contract or from a specific fiscal year through the current reporting period.

values.label: Contract billing, forecast
values.comment: The amount expected to be billed for a contract.

values.label: Contract termination costs, estimated
values.comment: The estimate of the costs that would be incurred to liquidate all obligations if the contract were to be terminated.

values.label: Contract funds forecast, unauthorized work
values.comment: A forecast of the funds required for unauthorized work on a contract.

values.label: Contract funds forecast, additional work
values.comment: A forecast of the funds required for additional work on a contract.

values.label: Contract total funds required, estimated
values.comment: Estimate of the total funds required for a contract.

values.label: Contract funds carried forward
values.comment: Amount of contract funds carried forward.

values.label: Contract net funds required, estimated
values.comment: Estimate of net funds required for a contract based on total funding requirements less any funds carried over from a previous year.

values.label: Cost variance at completion
values.comment: The cost difference between budget at completion and estimate at completion.

values.label: Harmonized tariff schedule mixture, composite or set value
values.comment: The value of a mixture, composite, or set as defined by the harmonized tariff schedule general rules of interpretation 3(b) or 3(c).

values.label: Agreed monetary amount debit line limit
values.comment: Limit of the agreed monetary amount debit line.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related charges, not included in debit amount.

values.label: Total debit allowances, not included in debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related allowances, not included in debit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, included in debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related charges, included in debit amount.

values.label: Total debit allowances, included in debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related allowances, included in debit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in debit amount, to be booked simultaneously with debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related charges, not included in debit amount, to be booked at the same time as the debit amount.

values.label: Total debit allowances, not included in debit amount, to be booked simultaneously with debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related allowances, not included in debit amount, to be booked at the same time as the debit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in debit amount, to be booked separately from debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related charges, not included in debit amount, not to be booked together with the debit amount.

values.label: Total debit allowances, not included in debit amount, to be booked separately from debit amount
values.comment: Total debit related allowances, not included in debit amount, not to be booked together with the debit amount.

values.label: Annual turnover
values.comment: The annual turnover.

values.label: Dispensing fee
values.comment: Fee for dispensing.

values.label: Gross premium
values.comment: The total premium including all commission and fees but excluding external taxes.

values.label: Net premium
values.comment: The premium net of all additions.

values.label: Engineering fee amount
values.comment: The amount of engineering fees.

values.label: Insurer paid tax amount
values.comment: The amount of tax that is paid by the insurer and not included in the premium.

values.label: Insurance fixed co-payment
values.comment: The fixed contribution required to be paid by the insured person.

values.label: Insurance variable co-payment
values.comment: The variable contribution required to be paid by the insured person.

values.label: Negotiated contract changes
values.comment: The cumulative cost, excluding any fee or profit, applicable to defined contract changes that have occurred since the beginning of the contract and have been negotiated and agreed to.

values.label: Pre-invoiced amount
values.comment: Amount that is, or will be pre-invoiced.

values.label: Amount accumulated to deductible
values.comment: Amount paid toward the deductible amount.

values.label: Deductible amount remaining
values.comment: The amount of the deductible remaining.

values.label: Postage
values.comment: The amount for postage.

values.label: Earlier debit amount
values.comment: Amount which has been debited earlier.

values.label: Opening value date balance
values.comment: Opening balance on the value date.

values.label: Closing value date balance
values.comment: Closing balance on the value date.

values.label: Schedule variance amount
values.comment: The difference between the amount of work scheduled or planned (the budget) and the work completed (earned value) in cost terms for a given reporting period.

values.label: Schedule variance amount, cumulative to date
values.comment: The cumulative to date difference between the amount of work scheduled or planned (the budget) and the work completed (earned value) in cost terms.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in credit amount
values.comment: Total debit-related charges, not yet included in credit amount.

values.label: Total credit allowances, not included in credit amount
values.comment: Total credit-related allowances, not yet included in credit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, included in credit amount
values.comment: Total debit-related charges, already included in credit amount.

values.label: Total credit allowances, included in credit amount
values.comment: Total credit-related allowances, already included in credit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in credit amount, to be booked simultaneously with credit amount
values.comment: Total debit-related charges, not yet inlcuded in credit amount, will be booked at the same time as the credit amount.

values.label: Total credit allowances, not included in credit amount, to be booked simultaneously with credit amount
values.comment: Total credit-related allowances, not yet included in credit amount, will be booked at the same time as the credit amount.

values.label: Total debit charges, not included in credit amount, to be booked separately from credit amount
values.comment: Total debit-related charges, not yet included in credit amount, will not be booked together with the credit amount.

values.label: Total credit allowances, not included in credit amount, to be booked separately from credit amount
values.comment: Total credit-related allowances, not yet included in credit amount, will not be booked together with the credit amount.

values.label: Total charges, not included in transaction amount
values.comment: Total charges which are not included in the transaction amount.

values.label: Total allowances, not included in transaction amount
values.comment: Total allowances which are not included in the transaction amount.

values.label: Late delivery penalty
values.comment: Amount to be paid in case of late delivery.

values.label: Debt financing charge
values.comment: A charge amount related to the financing of a debt.

values.label: Debt financing allowance
values.comment: An allowance amount related to the financing of a debt.

values.label: Cancellation charge
values.comment: The amount charged because of a cancellation.

values.label: Incurred cost
values.comment: The amount which has been incurred.

values.label: Accrued overdraft interest
values.comment: Interest amount accrued through overdraft.

values.label: Total returnable packaging deposit amount
values.comment: Total deposit amount for returnable packaging.

values.label: Goods and services total amount excluding returnable goods deposits
values.comment: Total amount of goods and services excluding deposits for returnable goods.

values.label: Waiting time indemnity amount
values.comment: The monetary amount which is used as an indemnity for waiting.

values.label: Total net amount excluding Value Added Tax (VAT)
values.comment: The total net monetary amount excluding Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Interest on late payment of solidarity fund contribution
values.comment: Interest to pay because payment date of contribution solidarity fund was exceeded.

values.label: Interest on late payment of employee's additional contribution to solidarity fund
values.comment: Interest to pay because payment date of employee's additional contribution is exceeded.

values.label: Taxable disbursement amount
values.comment: Amount of disbursement on which tax must be applied.

values.label: Contract total amount
values.comment: [5060] Total value of a contract.

values.label: Daily contribution
values.comment: Amount paid on a daily basis.

values.label: Rental amount
values.comment: The amount to be paid for the right to use a place, product or service.

values.label: Gross progress payment amount
values.comment: Gross monetary amount paid or to be paid at intervals.

values.label: Net progress payment amount
values.comment: Net monetary amount paid or to be paid at intervals.

values.label: Value of returned product
values.comment: Value of product returned by the customer.

values.label: Unit allowance amount
values.comment: The monetary amount of an allowance for each unit.

values.label: Remaining available overdraft
values.comment: The amount still available within the limit of the overdraft.

values.label: Unit charge amount
values.comment: The monetary amount of a charge for each unit.

values.label: Agreed monetary amount credit line limit
values.comment: Limit of the agreed monetary amount credit line.

values.label: Dossier amount
values.comment: The amount of the dossier.

values.label: Amount for pre-advising
values.comment: The amount is for pre-advising only.

values.label: Supplement
values.comment: The monetary amount represents the price of extra cost to pay in addition to the normal price.

values.label: Debit balance at closing date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amonunt is the debit balance at the closing date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Credit balance at closing date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the credit balance at the closing date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Debit balance at starting date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the debit balance at the starting date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Credit balance at starting date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the credit balance at the starting date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Total of debit balances at closing date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the total of debit balances at the closing date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Total of credit balances at closing date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the total of credit balances at the closing date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Total of debit balances at starting date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the total of debit balances at the starting date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Total of credit balances at starting date of accounting period under review
values.comment: The monetary amount is the total of credit balances at the starting date of the accounting period under review.

values.label: Cost accounting entry amount
values.comment: Code identifying the amount of a cost accounting entry.

values.label: Tariff
values.comment: The monetary amount represents the tariff.

values.label: Volume discount
values.comment: A discount for reaching or exceeding an agreed volume.

values.label: Product range discount
values.comment: Discount for the purchase of a whole range of products.

values.label: Calculation basis excluding all taxes
values.comment: The amount used as the basis for calculation excludes all taxes.

values.label: Calculation basis which includes all taxes except VAT
values.comment: The amount, used as the basis for calculation, which includes all taxes except Value Added Tax (VAT).

values.label: Refund
values.comment: The monetary amount being reimbursed.

values.label: Total returnable packaging rental amount
values.comment: Total rental amount for returnable packaging.

values.label: Total Marine Diesel Oil on board amount, on arrival
values.comment: Total amount of Marine Diesel Oil (MDO) on board when vessel arrives in port.

values.label: Total Marine Diesel Oil amount, loaded
values.comment: Total amount of Marine Diesel Oil (MDO) taken on in the port.

values.label: Total Intermediate Fuel Oil on board amount, on arrival
values.comment: Total amount of Intermediate Fuel Oil (IFO) on board when vessel arrives in port.

values.label: Total Intermediate Fuel Oil amount, loaded
values.comment: Total amount of Intermediate Fuel Oil (IFO) taken on in the port.

values.label: Total Bunker C oil on board amount, on arrival
values.comment: Total amount of Bunker C, or Number 6 fuel oil on board when vessel arrives in port.

values.label: Total Bunker C oil amount, loaded
values.comment: Total amount of Bunker C or Number 6 fuel oil on board when vessel arrives in port.

values.label: Government agency valuation commodity value
values.comment: The value of the commodity for the purposes of a government agency valuation.

values.label: Valuation adjustment amount
values.comment: [5514] Amount of adjustments to the valuation, e.g. price influence, royalties, assists, proceeds and commissions.

values.label: Damage allowance
values.comment: An allowance made in the value to the extent of the damage or defect.

values.label: Air transport freight cost
values.comment: Charges relating to the air transport of the goods which represent the freight charges only (i.e. not including the handling charges, agency fees etc.).

values.label: Unloading and handling cost
values.comment: Cost incurred by unloading and handling.

values.label: Commission and brokerage, except buying commission
values.comment: A monetary amount representing commissions and brokerage paid by or on behalf of the purchaser of goods excluding buying commission.

values.label: Taxable amount - excluding payment discount amount
values.comment: Indication of the total taxable amount before deducting payment discount amount.

values.label: Must buy product in multi-buy promotion value
values.comment: The value of a product which must be bought in order to qualify for a multi-buy promotion.

values.label: Additional voluntary contribution amount
values.comment: Additional voluntary contribution amount paid by the employee.

values.label: Interest amount over employee's obligatory contribution
values.comment: Interest amount calculated over the employee's obligatory contribution.

values.label: Prepaid amount related to the obligatory contribution
values.comment: Prepaid amount related to the employee's obligatory contribution.

values.label: Amount to be compensated between social security entities
values.comment: Amount which needs to be compensated between social security entities.

values.label: Bank check amount
values.comment: Amount to be paid by bank check.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Mutually defined monetary amount.
